title: 2 EX Looking, but probably trimmed T206's For Sale - Brown Chicago and Purtell
author: tinkertoeverstochance

posts.post_title: 2 EX Looking, but probably trimmed T206's For Sale - Brown Chicago and Purtell
posts.post_content:
Both cards appear EX at first glance, but I believe both have been slightly trimmed on one side (bottom boarder). Both cards are approximately the correct size for t206's and are free of stains, creases, and wrinkles.

All SOLD

$22 shipped for the Purtell. This will be the only price reduction before I auction these on eBay. E-mail if interested.

Thanks,
Lee

I'll take the Brown

Thanks,
Ron
